entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING ENDED, La Grande-Quatre

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
